Rugby player Leslie Topia Barrowcliffe, of Taranaki, loses name suppression on sex video charges https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rugby-player-leslie-topia-barrowcliffe-of-taranaki-loses-name-suppression-on-sex-video-charges/A2ZTEDZDYBAAZLRI64HM5EJDGA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rugby-player-leslie-topia-barrowcliffe-of-taranaki-loses-name-suppression-on-sex-video-charges/A2ZTEDZDYBAAZLRI64HM5EJDGA/ Tara ShaskeyLeslie Topia Barrowcliffe was selected for the Chiefs under-20s squad this year. Mon, 18 Nov 2024 20:51:06 +0000 Leslie Topia Barrowcliffe was convicted of making and sharing a covertly filmed sex video.
The New Zealand town with the most business break-ins https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/companies/retail/the-new-zealand-town-with-the-most-business-break-ins/2RYTR3C5IZDJJMLQXDTSBBDCWM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/companies/retail/the-new-zealand-town-with-the-most-business-break-ins/2RYTR3C5IZDJJMLQXDTSBBDCWM/ Tom RaynelThe data show Rotorua has the highest proportion of burglaries in New Zealand. Mon, 18 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Rotorua is New Zealand's business break-in capital, with a whopping 40.3 break-ins per 10,000 residents. Elsewhere, Porirua is New Zealand's safest, with just 6.1 break-ins per 10,000. Photo / Andrew Warner

Stolen caravan and wrench-throwing in Coromandel results in two arrests https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/stolen-caravan-and-wrench- throwing-in-coromandel-results-in-two-arrests/ITANY4PVVBCRBLUISBRMWTN53A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/stolen-caravan-and-wrench- throwing-in-coromandel-results-in-two-arrests/ITANY4PVVBCRBLUISBRMWTN53A/ A hammer was thrown at police during pursuit and a wrench hit two members of the public.
